## General notes on the naijR package

### What this package should do:
1.  List political divisions
  i) Geopolitical Zones
  ii) States
  iii) Local Government Areas
  iv) Political Wards

2. Map
  i) Map of Nigeria
  ii) Subdivided into states
  iii) Map of each state
  iv) subdivided into LGAs

3. Postal codes

4. Access key Nigeria-specific databases

5. Hold key datasets for quick reference and to serve as samples

6. (more to come...)
